title: Kamala Harris 2020 | Guests: Kelly Shackleford & John MacArthur | 8/12/20
description:
Joe Biden chose Sen. Kamala Harris as his running mate, but does she actually appeal to anyone? Even Democrats believe a “President Harris” is certain if Biden’s elected. Jason Buttrill previews tonight’s Glenn TV show, “Brave New World: The Left’s March Toward Global Fascism." A California teacher speaks anonymously about how districts are adopting communist ideas and critical race theory. Reform California chairman Carl DeMaio exposes how state Democrats want to get rid of independent contractors, including tutors. First Liberty Institute president and CEO Kelly Shackleford discusses the growing attack on religion. Grace Community Church Pastor John MacArthur called his latest service a “peaceful protest."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
